Name: Shallow Space
About the game: Construct your fleet ship-by-ship by foraging in asteroid clusters and nebulas for resources and completing missions. Evolve your fleet Commanders careers, customize your ships using loot savaged from wreckages, become embroiled in action spanning huge playable areas and work across multiple planetary areas to bring order or wreck chaos in Shallow Space.
